meanings.definition: A cushioned footstool or low seat.
meanings.sent1: I rested my feet on the pouffe after a long day.
meanings.sent2: The living room had a cozy pouffe for extra seating.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the pouffe was a giant toy and pounced on it.
meanings.sent4: The pouffe was like a fluffy cloud under my tired feet.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pouffe added a touch of whimsy to the room.

meanings.definition: A hairstyle in which the hair is puffed out in a rounded shape.
meanings.sent1: She styled her hair in a retro pouffe for the costume party.
meanings.sent2: The actress sported a glamorous pouffe on the red carpet.
meanings.sent3: The pouffe hairstyle made her look taller than she actually was.
meanings.sent4: Her pouffe hairdo reminded me of a fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: The elaborate pouffe added volume and drama to her look.

meanings.definition: A large, soft, round cushion used as a seat.
meanings.sent1: The kids loved sitting on the pouffe during storytime.
meanings.sent2: The pouffe in the corner of the room was perfect for lounging.
meanings.sent3: The dog claimed the pouffe as its new favorite napping spot.
meanings.sent4: She sank into the pouffe as if it was a marshmallow.
meanings.sent5: The velvety pouffe was a luxurious addition to the decor.
